605690.name: Holodrive - Founder's Pack
605690.description:
The Founder's Pack includes new gear that will help players show off their dummy in a Saga-tastic way.

Contents:

Iver Set (from Banner Saga)
Dredge Set (from Banner Saga)
Alette Set (from Banner Saga)
10 Holopacks
2640 Bits

Every Holopack gives you one random weapon or customization, so you can turn your robot into the most stylish one out there. Also, the Banner Saga and secret sets are EXCLUSIVE to the Founders Pack supporters, meaning you're gonna be envy of the battlefield whenever you're wearing them! If you buy this pack you will receive all the Secret Sets as they are released!

A Special Thanks for the Banner Saga Team for letting us create costumes based on their awesome game! Skol!
605690.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
